attributes.action: force the Olympic Delivery Authority to use the new Wembley stadium in 2012 instead of building a new one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The designers of the new Wembley stadium ensured that it is a multi-purpose stadium and that it allows the UK to bid for the greatest events in world sport, including the Olympic Games.

Think of the money that would be saved !
